data.description:
FIGHT with any weapon you can find against different enemies in the Hex7 Arenas. 
DEFEND yourself with shield and sword and don't forget to RELOAD your guns once in awhile.
                                                                                                                                                                       
![{"height":1440,"type":"image","width":2560}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/39031640_1611492052972544_8434024045580790583_n.png?_nc_cat=111&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=5IARv5LBWLgQ7kNvgFFNbEe&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&_nc_gid=ARgMfeY0xBwn6cC0vBiA91j&oh=00_AYCqn7jnCerZtWse907XICckLCBjtPe2Fo_LKqjTeydqlQ&oe=66F5598C)
SURVIVE the first 7 ROUNDS.
Have FUN customizing your game as much as you like.
![{"height":1440,"type":"image","width":2560}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/39035393_1502492917145105_2500292279720560247_n.png?_nc_cat=110&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=OTjEnpKgf_0Q7kNvgEFM4f6&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&_nc_gid=ARgMfeY0xBwn6cC0vBiA91j&oh=00_AYBSUfpyfCcBXljOj6sKe-paDfRRtSVs4xRU9Gez1Bqq6A&oe=66F5579F)
EXPLORE the Arenas and enjoy the different game modes.
![{"height":1440,"type":"image","width":2560}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/75392879_331169873202633_892518978300243902_n.png?_nc_cat=100&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=crmTTMeD2mgQ7kNvgFqL_hs&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&_nc_gid=ARgMfeY0xBwn6cC0vBiA91j&oh=00_AYBlSwi8cZhPuvnvwh4zZ_iRHBPE_s3f-1Rk0C3XJLDqSQ&oe=66F53CF1)
